cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the local decoding of Reed-Muller codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also uses algebraic function fields and algebraic geometry codes, which are topics in computer science theory (cs.DS) and coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also discusses the query complexity of the decoding algorithm, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR) and computational complexity (cs.SI).
